jumbotron.heading: Create Businesses on the Internet of Value

banner.title: Get started
banner.text: Learn how to get VRSC, which wallets to use and how to interact with the Verus network.

cardBanner: Verus is scalable public infrastructure for the world.

pbaasCard.text: Use Public Blockchains as a Service to deploy customizable, scalable and interoperable blockchains within minutes. No need to provision additional resources.

verusCard.text: Digital identities, assets and namespaces for any project. Self-sovereign, decentralized or even centralized. The most complete identity system in the world.

defiCard.text: Instant liquidity for blockchain and token projects. Create markets and find funding. Use for lending and borrowing.

privCard.text: Your privacy is a human right. Get fully encrypted zero knowledge private transactions.

interopCard.text: Exchange value and data seamlessly across blockchains and other systems. Connect any system together with Verus Interchain Protocol.

dataCard.text: Define and publish verifiable data structures across blockchains and other systems. With Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF) itâ€™s never been easier.

paymentCard.text: You get cheap, fast, scalable and final payments. An essential element of all decentralized systems.
